Articles.Content: I can't wait to see the finished product!
Hi there) i have same problem with War Eagle1, game didnt load with this mod, game version 021.1 without any mods, what i have to do?
Make a new copy of KSP, only run the soviet pack on it.should help a bit.

Hey there

Have a question: I think I will manage to bring the buran with the ISS-Zarya module into a 100km orbit (my last curve was not really good, so i made a 17km periapsis);

But as the ISS does orbit the earth in about 400km, I also wanted to do the same in ksp.

How can I change the fuel/weight ratio of the Buran rocket to be able to make a 400km orbit, without adding rockets or other stuff?

Of course, the only stuff is my cargo, the Zarya, or other modules.

thanks very much!

EDIT: got a proton-k with zarya into a 400km orbit... I changed the CFGs from the first two stages of the proton rocket, to get a delta-v from about 6500m/s. I also was able to bring all the debris back to kerbin

Edited September 2, 2013 by AndySanba

In Kerbin scale 400km orbit analog its 200-230km orbit.

Not need change anything ))
Hey bobcat! What is next for the soviet pack?
no any idea about this

Zenit, UR-700, the voshkod capsule( someone else is doing Vostok as you know) general memory reduction and preformance increases are all good things to add in the next update.

Edited September 2, 2013 by DarthVader

Hi,

I installed the Soviet Pack but is seems that I am missing some craft files. No Proton or Klipper?
They aren't included, but easy to make.
this pack for "for self learning" use ))
Bobcat's Soyuz ships = best station service modules ever!

BobCat Vostok and Voshod will be great!!!!!!!!!! and complete for pack!

p.s. and Sputnik)
How about Zarya spacecraft? Or Molniya upper stage? Or historical spacecraft? (Sputnik,Luna,Venera and Mars probes, Elektron,Foton,Proton,Polyot and Molniya satellites...)

I have a bug which the Soviet Pack or anything else could be, I'm not sure. Sometimes the spacecraft starts to spin randomly for no reason what makes docking impossible. Does anyone know anything about it? Has this occured for anybody else?

Edited September 6, 2013 by Reddragon
Do you have SAS on?

The problem occours with or without SAS but not always. If I turn SAS on it keeps it straight but when I make a turn (with SAS on) for docking alignment as soon as I press WASD it starts to spin for a direction which makes docking out of question. I have a bunch of helpful mods installed like RCS build (first i thought it caused the bug but not), crew manifest and docking alignment. Maybe one of these other mods was the saboteur. I'll try it without any other mods installed.

The dl for the Soviet Pack is corrupted.

It says the file is invalid. Halp pls?
Download it with a download manager, not directly through your browser.

The dl for the Soviet Pack is corrupted.

I think its spaceport problem.
It's something to do with the Spaceport servers timing out on large downloads. As I said, use a download manager like Getright and it downloads just fine.
Maybe the ICBM/IRBM version of the R7/Soyuz launcher. That'd be nice.
what about Apollo applications, or some of the other never-done american spacecraft.

im update Soviet pack to beta version.

Change texture format to mbm , im hope this fix game launch problem.
Any efforts to overcome some of the memory issues would be much appreciated, I'm sure, BobCat. I miss the wonderful Soyuz vehicle in my own program.
